tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
full_summary:
### National Capital Region Temporary Help Services Requirement 

#### Tender Details 

*   **Reference Number**: CB-449-90013058
*   **Solicitation Number**: S4714424
*   **Publication Date**: February 6, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 14, 2024, 12:00 PM EST

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking to engage a supplier under the Temporary Help Services arrangement (en578-172870) for specialized advisory services.

#### Service Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for specialized advisory services:

*   **Scope of Work:** The requirement is for one (1) Special Advisor (13.9), a security clearance level of Top Secret SIGINT.
*   **Deliverables:** The successful supplier will provide services for the specified duration.
*   **Expected Duration:** The actual start date and end date will be as per the contract.

#### Tendering Process

This requirement is only open to those suppliers holding a valid Temporary Help Services arrangement (EN578-172870) for 13.9 Special Advisor. The following invited suppliers have been pre-selected for this procurement:

*   ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corporation
*   Cache Computer Consulting Corporation
*   Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
*   DBHS Security Consulting Inc.
*   H2 ANALYTICS INC.
*   IT/NET - Ottawa Inc.
*   Maverin Inc.
*   PRECISIONERP INCORPORATED
*   Procom Consultants Group Limited
*   Prologic Systems Limited
*   Protak Consulting Group Incorporated
*   PureLogic IT Solutions Incorporated
*   S.I. Systems Incorporated
*   Tech4soft Incorporated
*   The AIM Group Incorporated

#### Contact Information

*   **Point of Contact:** Canadian Forces Support Group (G-O, Temp Help)
*   **Email:** [cfsgo-gtemporaryhelp-gsforcdaidetemeporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:cfsgo-gtemporaryhelp-gsforcdaidetemeporaire@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Phone Number:** (613) 971-7955

#### Download Tender Documents

The tender notice, requirements, and attachments can be accessed via the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
